fu.search

Class StrongSimplifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.search.StrongSimplifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextSimplifier

    public class StrongSimplifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextSimplifier
    This TextSimplifier very strongly simplifies a text to allow equality of nearby strings.
